title: Spanish for Beginners
description: Start your learning journey with essential vocabulary, basic grammar, and everyday phrases. No prior experience needed!
learning_outcomes: Understand and use common daily expressions.

title: Spanish for Travel
description: Prepare for your next adventure! This course covers essential phrases, cultural tips, and scenarios for navigating Spanish-speaking countries with ease.
learning_outcomes: Book hotels and order food confidently.
Ask for directions and use public transportation.
Understand key cultural dos and don'ts.

title: Intermediate Conversation
description: Improve your fluency and confidence with practical conversation drills, role-playing, and interactive sessions.
learning_outcomes: Engage in conversations on familiar topics.
Describe experiences, events, dreams, and ambitions.
Handle most situations likely to arise while traveling.

title: Advanced Grammar Mastery
description: Master complex grammatical structures, refine your writing, and understand the nuances of the Spanish language.
learning_outcomes: Write clear, well-structured essays and reports.

title: Spanish for Business
description: Learn to communicate effectively and professionally in a Spanish-speaking business environment.
learning_outcomes: Lead and participate in business meetings.

title: Advanced Conversation & Debate
description: Perfect your oral expression by engaging in debates, simulated interviews, and discussions on current events.
learning_outcomes: Articulate and defend opinions on complex topics.
Understand and use idiomatic expressions correctly.
